error_disconnect_before_changing_fee_gra: Please dis-connect from VPN before Changing Fee Granter
error_disconnect_before_changing_rpc: Please dis-connect from VPN before Changing RPC
error_disconnect_before_switch: Please dis-connect from VPN before switching
error_failed_create_session_no_balance: Failed to Create a Session since insufficient balance
error_failed_subscription_no_balance: Failed to subscribe due to insufficient balance
error_offline_node: Selected Server is offline or not available
error_server_is_offline: Server is offline, please try again later
fee_grant_subheader: Fee Granter will soon be available. Please proceed without fee grant, your wallet has been funded for gas payments. Please check your internet connection before proceeding.
how_does_sentinel_dvpn_work_desc: A Sentinel dVPN account that you can generate has a public key and a private key. The public key is like your phone number and is shared with others in order to receive an incoming transaction. The private key is the password and must be stored safely as there is no back-up being stored anywhere on any server. You are the only one who has your password and if you lose it your account is lost. This is real security, real trust, and real decentralization. Don't trust centralized VPN applications which offer 0 transparency.
how_to_deposit_desc: You can deposit DVPN to your wallet from any exchange or wallet. Just send them to your wallet address. You can copy your wallet address by clicking on the button below or by scanning the QR code.
intro_slides_one_text_five: to see this dVPN application's code on Github
intro_slides_one_text_one: Sentinel Shield is a fully decentralized, open-source, and peer to peer VPN application. Browse the internet with no centralized servers or obscure code monitoring you.
intro_slides_one_text_two: The Sentinel Shield dVPN is built on
intro_slides_three_text_four: on Sentinel allow for users to receive 1-click access to thousands of nodes.
intro_slides_three_text_two: is used as a payment for subscription in this application. The current rate for 1 month of subscription is 1333.33 $DVPN. New payment methods will be added in the near future.
intro_slides_two_text_one: Servers hosted on Sentinel are hosted by individuals from all over the world. These servers communicate directly with the Sentinel blockchain to indicate their availability, and the Sentinel Shield dVPN scans the Sentinel blockchain to identify available servers.
modal_error_while_initiating_the_app: There is an error while initiating the app.
modal_failed_fetch_subcriptions: Unable to get your subcription details now!
modal_logout_checkbox_label: I have stored my private key
modal_logout_desc: Make sure you have a copy of your keys otherwise you cannot recover your wallet.
modal_no_balance_desc: You have insufficient balance in your account!
modal_no_subscriptions_desc: Purchase one month of subscription from a decentralized contract on
modal_no_subscriptions_title: You do not have an active subscription
modal_try_again_subsctiptions: Please retry to fetch the subcription details!
modal_update_app_to_enjoy: Please update the app to fix any bugs and ensure security.
welcome_home_description: Decentralized, Open-Source, p2p VPN application powered by the Sentinel Blockchain
welcome_to_sentinel_desc: Create a new on-chain account anonymously today or import an existing account from Sentinel's Layer-1 Networking DePin focused chain.
your_unique_private_key_desc: Copy down this unique {{length}} word key somewhere safe. This key will be needed to access your wallet incase you get logged out or need to use your wallet outside this application.
